posts.title: When your code works on the first try
posts.body:
Me: *writes code*
Code: *compiles without errors*
Me: Wait, that's illegal ðŸ¤”

||Spoiler: It had bugs in production||

posts.title: Client feedback be like
posts.body:
Client: "Can you make the logo bigger?"
Me: "Sure"
Client: "Actually, make it smaller"
Me: "No problem"
Client: "You know what, bigger is better"

This went on for 47 iterations... ||Spoiler: They chose the original size||

posts.title: Another meeting that could have been an email
posts.body:
Actual meeting duration: 1 hour
Useful information shared: 5 minutes
Time spent listening to people who love hearing themselves talk: 55 minutes

posts.title: 3 AM debugging session
posts.body:
Me at 3 AM: *finally finds the bug*
The bug: a missing semicolon from 2 weeks ago
Me: ||Spoiler: I'm questioning all my life choices||

posts.title: When the campaign goes viral
posts.body:
That moment when your meme marketing campaign actually works and the engagement goes through the roof ðŸš€

CEO: "Great work!"
Me: *frantically trying to remember what I did*

posts.title: Git troubles
posts.body:
Just typed "git push --force" on the main branch...

||Spoiler: The entire team is now hunting me down||

Update: I've been told to update my resume

posts.title: Pixel perfect or pixel disaster?
posts.body:
Designers: *spends hours perfecting a design*
Developers: *implements with 2px off*
Designers: "MY EYES! MY BEAUTIFUL DESIGN!"

True story from this morning's standup

posts.title: Just a small feature
posts.body:
Stakeholder: "This is just a small feature, shouldn't take long"
Me: *creates 47-page technical specification*
Stakeholder: "Wait, I didn't mean..."

||Spoiler: The "small feature" took 3 sprints||

posts.title: WFH perks
posts.body:
Best part about working from home:
- No commute
- Comfy clothes
- Can make fresh coffee anytime

||Spoiler: Also means eating the entire fridge during meetings||

posts.title: Friday deployments
posts.body:
Boss: "Let's deploy to production on Friday afternoon"
Me: *sweating nervously*

||Spoiler: Spent the whole weekend fixing issues||
